EmailTemplate.name: Channel Partner Has Not Updated Lead Status – 60 Days
EmailTemplate.subject: 60 Day Alert: Please Update Lead Status
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.OwnerFullName},
It has been 60 days since you’ve updated the status of your lead, {!Lead.Lead_Number__c}.
Please evaluate the lead and update the status from sales accepted lead using the following designations:
Sales Qualified:
A lead that has evolved into a qualified pipeline opportunity.
Recycle:
Lead needs to be sent back to marketing because they are not ready to buy, but the lead needs to remain active. Requirement may arise at a future date (e.g. due mandate).
Disqualified:
Lead is not appropriate or viable; incorrect contact info, not our target market, lead is from a student or job seeker or customer is not interested.
Converted:
Lead is successfully closed and won.
Thank you for your cooperation.
The Honeywell Marketing Team
